content.rendered:
Gentle and fragrance free, Baby Mineral Sunscreen is the best zinc sunscreen for your little ones chubby cheeks. Broad spectrum UVA + UVB protection and is able to achieve its SPF 50+ rating due to new micronised zinc oxide technology. It’s a lightweight, mineral zinc enriched with emollients for extra hydration. Unlike other physical, zinc only sunscreens, this lightweight, non-greasy formula rubs in clear and is 80 minutes water resistant to give you maximum coverage. Designed for the whole family and suitable for all skin types. Protecting delicate skin is our business.

Dermatologically tested and clinically proven for sensitive skin.

excerpt.rendered:
Protection for the most delicate of skin – from babies to beach babes!

  • Free from fragrance, PABAs, parabens, oxybenzone and octinoxate.
  • Australian owned and made.
